issue.title: sdf::Element::GetElement fails with undefined reference to `xmlCharStrdup` at runtime when used in plugin

content.raw:
Additional information, libsdformat.so has the following shared object deps:

```
[moldy-crow:~/ws/hydro/underlay]$ readelf -d /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libsdformat.so

Dynamic section at offset 0xcf958 contains 30 entries:
  Tag        Type                         Name/Value
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libtinyxml.so.2.6.2]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libboost_system.so.1.46.1]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libboost_filesystem.so.1.46.1]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libboost_regex.so.1.46.1]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libstdc++.so.6]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libm.so.6]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libgcc_s.so.1]
 0x0000000000000001 (NEEDED)             Shared library: [libc.so.6]
```

issue.title: sdf::Element::GetElement fails with undefined reference to `xmlCharStrdup` at runtime when used in plugin

content.raw: sdformat doesn't use libxml2; it uses tinyxml. Could this be a problem with your plugin?
content.html: sdformat doesn't use libxml2; it uses tinyxml. Could this be a problem with your plugin?

issue.title: sdf::Element::GetElement fails with undefined reference to `xmlCharStrdup` at runtime when used in plugin

content.raw: I'm not sure why it would cause a problem, also, the lookup error is actually happening in `sdf::Element::Get<std::string>(...)`.
content.html: I'm not sure why it would cause a problem, also, the lookup error is actually happening in sdf::Element::Get<std::string>(...).

issue.title: sdf::Element::GetElement fails with undefined reference to `xmlCharStrdup` at runtime when used in plugin

content.raw:
Is there a way to trace the connection between `sdf::Element::Get<std::string>(...)` and `xmlCharStrdup`?

What other libraries is your plugin linked with?
content.html:

issue.title: sdf::Element::GetElement fails with undefined reference to `xmlCharStrdup` at runtime when used in plugin

content.raw:
Also for reference, the plugin is here: https://github.com/jhu-lcsr/rtt_gazebo/tree/master/rtt_gazebo_deployer/src

And the symbol lookup error happens here:
https://github.com/jhu-lcsr/rtt_gazebo/blob/master/rtt_gazebo_deployer/src/gazebo_deployer_model_plugin.cpp#L159
content.html:
Also for reference, the plugin is here: https://github.com/jhu-lcsr/rtt_gazebo/tree/master/rtt_gazebo_deployer/src

And the symbol lookup error happens here: https://github.com/jhu-lcsr/rtt_gazebo/blob/master/rtt_gazebo_deployer/src/gazebo_deployer_model_plugin.cpp#L159
